anya-e0105n2:2_1: Kasmā vedakālato paṭṭhāya yāvajjatanā sabbepi brāhmaṇā
anya-e0105n2:5_0: Imaṁ purisasuttaṁ nāma mantaṁ jānantīti saddahiyā.
anya-e0105n2:6_3: khattiyā assa bāhūti vuttaṁ hoti. Yo vesso,
anya-e0105n2:7_0: Buddhaghoso pana ‘paṇḍitabrāhmaṇo’ti ñātopi taṁ gāthaṁ na aññāsi.
anya-e0105n2:7_1: Tathā hi tena bandhupādāpaccāti padassa atthavaṇṇanāyaṁ ‘tesaṁ kira ayaṁ laddhi –
anya-e0105n2:7_6: samaṇā piṭṭhipādato’ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.263; ma. ni. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n2:8_1: yadi ca taṁkālikānampi brāhmaṇānaṁ laddhi tatheva bhaveyya yathā etissaṁ gāthāyaṁ vuttā,
anya-e0105n2:8_3: Evaṁ sati sā vicāraṇā yuttā bhaveyya.
anya-e0105n2:8_4: Etissaṁ pana gāthāyaṁ “brāhmaṇosya mukhamāsīdi”ti paṭhamapādena “brāhmaṇā brahmuno mukhato jātā”ti attho ujukato na labbhati.
anya-e0105n2:8_5: Buddhakāle pana brāhmaṇānaṁ laddhi “brāhmaṇā brahmuno mukhato jātā”ti evameva ahosīti pākaṭoyevāyamattho.
anya-e0105n2:9_0: “Dissanti kho pana vāseṭṭha brāhmaṇānaṁ brāhmaṇiyo utuniyopi gabbhiniyopi vijāyamānāpi pāyamānāpi.
anya-e0105n2:9_1: Te ca brāhmaṇā 0 yonijāva samānā evamāhaṁsu –
anya-e0105n2:9_8: Brāhmaṇāva brahmuno puttā orasā mukhato jātā brahmajā brahmanimmitā brahmadāyādāti.
anya-e0105n2:10_2: Te pana dvepi māṇavakā jātivasena parisuddhabrāhmaṇā ceva honti tiṇṇampi vedānaṁ pāraguno ca.
anya-e0105n2:10_3: Tasmā “brāhmaṇā brahmuno mukhato nikkhantā”ti vacanassa taṁkālikānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ laddhivasena vuttabhāvo pākaṭoyeva.
anya-e0105n2:10_8: samaṇā piṭṭhipādato”ti vacanampi “taṁkālikabrāhmaṇānaṁ laddhiññūhi porāṇaṭṭhakathācariyehi vutta”nti
anya-e0105n2:10_9: saddahitvā ācariyabuddhaghosena taṁ sabbaṁ porāṇaṭṭhakathāto bhāsāparivattanamattena visesetvā pakāsitaṁ bhaveyya.
anya-e0105n2:10_10: Tasmā tāyapi vedagāthāya ācariyassa abrāhmaṇabhāvasādhanaṁ anupapannamevāti.
anya-e0105n2:11_0: (Kha) punapi tena ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa abrāhmaṇabhāvasādhanatthaṁ dutiyampi kāraṇaṁ evamāhaṭaṁ –
anya-e0105n2:12_0: “Brāhmaṇaganthesu gabbhaghātavācakaṁ bhrūnahāti padaṁ pāḷiyaṁ bhūnahu (bhūnahano) iti dissati.
anya-e0105n2:12_1: Māgaṇḍiyasutte bhariyāya methunasaṁvāsābhāvena uppajjanārahagabbhassa nāsakattaṁ sandhāya māgaṇḍiyo paribbājako
anya-e0105n2:12_4: Taṁ buddhaghoso na jānātīti pākaṭoyeva tadatthasaṁvaṇṇanāya.
anya-e0105n2:12_5: Tattha hi tena bhūnahunoti (bhūnahanassā) padaṁ ‘hatavaḍḍhino mariyādakārakassā’ti ma. ni. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n2:13_1: Na hi māgaṇḍiyena phoṭṭhabbārammaṇāparibhogamattameva sandhāya bhūnahubhāvo vutto,
anya-e0105n2:13_2: atha kho channampi lokāmisārammaṇānaṁ aparibhogaṁ sandhāya vutto.
anya-e0105n2:14_1: taṁ tathāgatassa dantaṁ guttaṁ rakkhitaṁ saṁvutaṁ,
anya-e0105n2:14_3: idaṁ nu te etaṁ māgaṇḍiya sandhāya bhāsitaṁ ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti.
anya-e0105n2:14_4: Etadeva kho pana me bho gotama sandhāya bhāsitaṁ ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti.
anya-e0105n2:14_7: mano kho māgaṇḍiya dhammārāmo dhammarato dhammasammudito,
anya-e0105n2:14_8: so tathāgatassa danto gutto rakkhito saṁvuto,
anya-e0105n2:14_10: idaṁ nu te etaṁ māgaṇḍiya sandhāya bhāsitaṁ ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti.
anya-e0105n2:14_11: Etadeva kho pana me bho gotama sandhāya bhāsitaṁ ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti.
anya-e0105n2:14_13: evañhi no sutte ocaratī”ti ma. ni.
anya-e0105n2:15_0: Evaṁ bhagavato ca anuyogo māgaṇḍiyassa ca paṭiññā āgatā.
anya-e0105n2:16_0: Ettha hi methunappaṭisevanavasena phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaparibhogahetu eva gabbhapatiṭṭhānaṁ sambhavatīti tadaparibhogameva
anya-e0105n2:16_3: tatthāpi visesato dhammārammaṇassa suddhamanoviññāṇena paribhogahetu natthi kiñci gabbhapatiṭṭhānanti
anya-e0105n2:16_4: tesaṁ aparibhogaṁ sandhāya bhūnahūti vattuṁ na arahatiyeva,
anya-e0105n2:16_5: māgaṇḍiyena pana sabbānipi tāni sandhāya vuttabhāvo paṭiññāto,
anya-e0105n2:16_9: māgaṇḍiyasutte paneso attho na yujjatīti ācariyena “hatavaḍḍhi mariyādakārako”ti ayamevattho porāṇaṭṭhakathāya
anya-e0105n2:17_2: 31) brāhmaṇānaṁ parihāsaṁ karonto ‘evaṁ iminā piṇḍapātapaṭisevanena purāṇañca jighacchāvedanaṁ paṭihaṅkhāmi,
anya-e0105n2:17_3: navañca vedanaṁ aparimitabhojanapaccayaṁ āharahatthaka alaṁsāṭaka tatravaṭṭaka kākamāsaka bhuttavamitakabrāhmaṇānaṁ
anya-e0105n2:17_4: aññataro viya na uppādessāmīti paṭisevatī’ti āha.
anya-e0105n2:17_5: Idaṁ pana ekassa bhinnabrāhmaṇaladdhikassāpi vacanaṁ siyāti tadeva daḷhakāraṇaṁ katvā na sakkā ‘buddhaghoso
anya-e0105n2:17_8: Na hetaṁ ācariyena brāhmaṇānaṁ parihāsaṁ kātukāmena vuttaṁ,
anya-e0105n2:17_10: aññadatthu yathābhūtamatthaṁ dassetvā sabrahmacārīnaṁ ovādānusāsanidānavasena vattabbaṭṭhānaṁ,
anya-e0105n2:17_12: Tathā hi ye loke paradattūpajīvino samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā aññe vāpi ca puggalā,
anya-e0105n2:17_13: te paccavekkhaṇañāṇarahitā asaṁvare ṭhitā kadāci atipaṇītaṁ rasaṁ pahūtaṁ laddhā aparimitampi bhuñjeyyuṁ,
anya-e0105n2:17_16: Imasmiñhi loke vassasatasahassehi vā vassakoṭīhi vā aparicchinnaddhāne ko sakkā vattuṁ “nedisā bhūtapubbā”ti.
anya-e0105n2:17_17: Tasmā tādisehi viya na aparimitabhojanehi bhavitabbanti ovādānusāsanidānavaseneva vuttaṁ.
anya-e0105n2:17_18: Tadevaṁ atthasaṁhitampi samānaṁ ayonisomanasikaroto anatthameva jātaṁ,
anya-e0105n2:17_19: yathā sabhariyassa māgaṇḍiyabrāhmaṇassa anāgāmimaggaphalatthāyapi desitā gāthā dha. pa. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n2:17_20: 1.sāmāvatīvatthu tesaṁ dhītuyā anatthāya saṁvattatīti saṁvegoyevettha brūhetabboti.
